# priceLocale

**Instance Property**

The locale used to format the discount price of the product.

## Declaration

```swift
var priceLocale: Locale { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the locale to format the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKProductDiscount/price].

## Getting Price and Payment Mode

- **price**: The discount price of the product in the local currency.
- **paymentMode**: The payment mode for this product discount.
- **SKProductDiscount.PaymentMode**: Values representing the payment modes for a product discount.
